documents.name: Animal Sanctuary
documents.benefit: Can provide food and lodging for exotic animals such as animal companions, houses 3 animals

documents.name: Artificers Workshop
documents.benefit: Provides for the construction of magical artifacts by a skilled artificer

documents.name: Ayrie
documents.benefit: allows for the training and use of bird-like flying beasts and monstrosities as mounts

documents.name: Ballista Emplacements
documents.benefit: Adds ballistas to strategic points on the castle walls

documents.name: Bard College
documents.benefit: A small college for bards, teaching students of the bardic school of the players choice, and collecting sizable tuitions from students

documents.name: Barracks Expansion
documents.benefit: Housing for soldiers, includes beds for 50 staff

documents.name: Barracks
documents.benefit: Housing for soldiers, includes beds for 50 staff

documents.name: Blacksmith - Magical
documents.benefit: Allows for purchasing common and uncommon magical weapons and armor at half cost

documents.name: Cash Crop Farm
documents.benefit: Grows a cash crop of players choice

documents.name: Castle Antimagic Fields
documents.benefit: protects the castle walls from magical attacks

documents.name: Castle Towers
documents.benefit: Provides additional defense for a castle, and rooms for 20 staff or guards

documents.name: Castle Wall
documents.benefit: Provides additional line of defense for castle buildings

documents.name: Chapel
documents.benefit: dedicated to God of choice, allows for recruitment of one cleric of same God, no high priests

documents.name: Clear Land
documents.benefit: Turn 1 km^2 of forested land into cleared land appropriate for farming.

documents.name: Constable's Office
documents.benefit: Gives constables a place to work from, includes two jail cells

documents.name: Crystal Room
documents.benefit: The mirrored walls of this room can be used to scry on any place within 5 miles

documents.name: District Wall Antimagic Fields
documents.benefit: protects an additional district wall from magical attacks

documents.name: District Wall Towers
documents.benefit: Defensive Towers for the a District Wall

documents.name: District Wall
documents.benefit: protects additional districts and related improvements from attack

documents.name: Dragon Roost
documents.benefit: Provides a home for an adult or lesser dragon, dragon not included

documents.name: Dungeon Expansion
documents.benefit: allows for keeping of up to 20 additional prisoners

documents.name: Dungeon
documents.benefit: allows for keeping of up to 20 prisoners

documents.name: Escape Tunnel
documents.benefit: Provides a way for those in the keep to escape to the outside should the castle fall

documents.name: Factory
documents.benefit: Produces simple finished trade goods of a type of the players choice

documents.name: Food Farm
documents.benefit: Grows food crops, enough to feed roughly 500 people

documents.name: Garden
documents.benefit: provides a space for planting specialized plants

documents.name: General Store
documents.benefit: sells common goods to the populace at large for profit

documents.name: Golem Forge
documents.benefit: Provides tools to construct golems and other constructs, cost to create golems reduced by 30%

documents.name: Harbor
documents.benefit: provides a place for ships to dock, provides tax revenue from ships docking fees

documents.name: Inn
documents.benefit: provides a place for ships to dock, provides tax revenue from ships docking fees

documents.name: Inner Wall Antimagic Fields
documents.benefit: protects the central village wall from magical attacks

documents.name: Inner Wall Defensive Towers
documents.benefit: provides additional defenses for the central village

documents.name: Inner Walls
documents.benefit: provides basic defenses for the central village

documents.name: Iron Mine
documents.benefit: mines iron for fun and profit

documents.name: Keep Expansion
documents.benefit: increases size of the keep

documents.name: Keep
documents.benefit: castle is habitable, includes an armory, a basic treasury and some fortifications

documents.name: Library
documents.benefit: Gives advantage on arcana, religion, and history checks when consulted

documents.name: Lumber Camp
documents.benefit: cuts trees for fun and profit

documents.name: Market
documents.benefit: a designated central marketplace for local merchants to set up their stalls and sell their wares, for a fee

documents.name: Merchant Bank
documents.benefit: Increases overall tax revenue by 10%, treasury earns interest at 0.2% per day

documents.name: Mill
documents.benefit: a water mill used to power factories and mill grain

documents.name: Moat and Drawbridge
documents.benefit: Provides additional protection from assault

documents.name: Net Guns
documents.benefit: Specialized Ballistas that fire bola like nets to restrain opponents, particularly flying creatures.

documents.name: Land
documents.benefit: Gain an additional 1 km^2 of unimproved forested land

documents.name: Nondetection Wards
documents.benefit: Using the ley line connection of the wizard tower, create a field of nondetection around the keep

documents.name: Outer Wall Antimagic Fields
documents.benefit: protects the town wall from magical attacks

documents.name: Outer Wall Defensive Towers
documents.benefit: Defensive Towers for the Outer Town Wall

documents.name: Outer Walls
documents.benefit: protects town and related improvements from attack

documents.name: Planar Gate
documents.benefit: Create  a permanent planar gate to a particular plane of existence

documents.name: Practice Field
documents.benefit: includes archery targets, practice dummies, etc. spending 4 hours practicing with a particular weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls with that weapon for 1 week

documents.name: Quarry
documents.benefit: cuts stone for fun and profit

documents.name: Road
documents.benefit: reduces travel time to Cur'Estan by 50%

documents.name: School
documents.benefit: a school house where local children can learn their letters and numbers

documents.name: Secured Treasury
documents.benefit: Magically secured treasury

documents.name: Seminary
documents.benefit: provide a place where people can learn the clerical arts, makes it easier to recruit clerics as followers, and collecting tuition from students

documents.name: Stables
documents.benefit: allows for the training and keeping of standard mounts such as horses and riding dogs

documents.name: Teleportation Circle
documents.benefit: allows easy teleportation to any other known teleportation circle, usable day construction begins

documents.name: Temple
documents.benefit: dedicated to God of choice, allows for recruitment of clerics of same God

documents.name: Theater
documents.benefit: A theater for the performing arts, collects fees from shows that wish to perform there

documents.name: Town
documents.benefit: build out from a village to a larger town, with housing for up to 1000 people

documents.name: Village
documents.benefit: build out a small village around your castle where people can live, with houses for up to 200 people

documents.name: Warehouse
documents.benefit: provides a location for merchants to store their goods

documents.name: Wizard College
documents.benefit: provides a place where people can learn the arcane arts, makes it easier to recruit wizards and sorcerers, and collect tuition from the students

documents.name: Wizard Tower
documents.benefit: by tapping into lay lines, allows arcane casters to restore all spell slots via a short rest
